articles.author: Sakshi Tiwari
articles.title: Russia’s Tu-22 M3 Bomber Comes ‘Crashing Down’ After Bombing Run; Ukraine Quickly Claims Shootdown - EurAsian Times
articles.description: After a spate of deadly air strikes carried out by Russia in the past few days, the Ukrainian forces might have exacted their revenge by taking down a vaunted Tu-22M3 bomber used to launch long-range missiles on Ukraine. Big Worry for Europe! Russian MiG-31 F…
